version_description: - Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- iOS11 Support - for more information and known limitations please refer sk120346.
- Search and Agenda View Enhancements in Calendar
- Granular folder sync capabilities
- Improved UX for meeting acceptance and categorization in Mail

- Improved UX for meeting acceptance and categorization in Mail

- Search and Agenda View Enhancements in Calendar
- Granular folder sync capabilities
- Improved UX for meeting acceptance and categorization in Mail
- Bug fixes
- General Improvements
- General Improvements

- Networking improvements
- Stability improvements

- Outlook Calendar Categories support
- Supports searching for an email folder in the email folders list
- Network performance improvements
- General enhancements and improvements based on customers’ feedback.

- Outlook Calendar Categories support
- Supports searching for an email folder in the email folders list
- Network performance improvements
- General enhancements and improvements based on customers’ feedback.

- Outlook Calendar Categories support
- Supports searching for an email folder in the email folders list
- Network performance improvements
- General enhancements and improvements based on customers’ feedback.
- General enhancements

- An improved internal Web Browser. For more information, refer to sk125572.
- Support opening archive files within email attachments. Supported formats: zip, 7z, rar.
- Automatically save email drafts while being composed.
- General improvements and enhancements based on customers’ feedback.

- An improved internal Web Browser. For more information, refer to sk125572.
- Support opening archive files within email attachments. Supported formats: zip, 7z, rar.
- Automatically save email drafts while being composed.
- General improvements and enhancements based on customers’ feedback.

iOS 12 support.
Bug Fixes.
- Bug fixes

- New and improved search capabilities for the business mail application
- Being able to drag & drop the recipients when composing a mail (i.e. moving from the “To” to the “CC” by dragging the recipient)
- Showing the To/Cc labels for a mail in the mails list (Controlled in the App Settings)
- Empty “junk mail” and “deleted items” folders in one click
- Mails synchronization improvements
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- Being able to write more than one mail at a time using mail composer cards
- Allow signature only for new mails (controlled by App settings)
- Confirmation for delete mail operation (controlled by App settings)
- Improve calendar sync to native device functionality (re-sync calendar every 24 hours- controlled by App settings)
- Bug fixes

- Added the ability to see in the Tasks app the "To Do" items as in outlook
- Better mails preview - adjusted to mobile device sizes
- Bug fixes

- Added the ability to see in the Tasks app the "To Do" items as in outlook
- Better mails preview - adjusted to mobile device sizes
- Bug fixes

- Added the ability to see in the Tasks app the "To Do" items as in outlook.
- Better mails preview - adjusted to mobile device sizes.
- Fix missing Portuguese translation.
- Bug fixes.

- Full support for the follow up feature as exist in Outlook. Being able to mark mails as flagged, completed, add them reminders, etc’. Flagged mails will appear in the “Tasks” application “to do” list.
- Allow forwarding a mail as attachment in your organization. You also now can save a mail in the “Saved File” app, and then attach it to another sent mail.
- Allow requesting a read receipt when sending a mail from Capsule Workspace in your organization. We added a "Settings" option to the mail compose screen and you can set this feature from there.
- Bug fixes

- Full support for the follow up feature as exist in Outlook. Being able to mark mails as flagged, completed, add them reminders, etc’. Flagged mails will appear in the “Tasks” application “to do” list.
- Allow forwarding a mail as attachment in your organization. You also now can save a mail in the “Saved File” app, and then attach it to another sent mail.
- Allow requesting a read receipt when sending a mail from Capsule Workspace in your organization. We added a "Settings" option to the mail compose screen and you can set this feature from there.
- Bug fixes

- Full support for the follow up feature as exist in Outlook. Being able to mark mails as flagged, completed, add them reminders, etc’. Flagged mails will appear in the “Tasks” application “to do” list.
- Allow forwarding a mail as attachment in your organization. You also now can save a mail in the “Saved File” app, and then attach it to another sent mail.
- Allow requesting a read receipt when sending a mail from Capsule Workspace in your organization. We added a "Settings" option to the mail compose screen and you can set this feature from there.
- Bug fixes

- Siri integration – you can now use Siri to send mails via Capsule! Check it out under Capsule's Settings -> "Mail, Contacts, Calendar" -> "Siri Shortcuts"
- Improve mail downloading time when getting push notification. The mail will be downloaded immediatly when the push arrives.
- Background Sync – sync mail in the background every X minutes (configurable in mail's settings).
- Improve mail's attachments downloading process – better performance and user experience.
- Improve user experience for renewing certificate process
- Bug fixes

- Siri integration – you can now use Siri to send mails via Capsule! Check it out under Capsule's Settings -> "Mail, Contacts, Calendar" -> "Siri Shortcuts"
- Improve mail downloading time when getting push notification. The mail will be downloaded immediatly when the push arrives.
- Background Sync – sync mail in the background every X minutes (configurable in mail's settings).
- Improve mail's attachments downloading process – better performance and user experience.
- Improve user experience for renewing certificate process
- Fix the "Edit Mode" bug
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- iOS14 Support
- Now using the new image, date, and colour pickers introduced by Apple for iOS 14
- Updating policy with no need to re-login
- Bug fixs

- iOS14 Support
- Now using the new image, date, and colour pickers introduced by Apple for iOS 14
- Updating policy with no need to re-login
- Bug fixs

- Control image size when attaching it to a mail. Can now select if image will have the actual, large, medium or small size.
- Added the "On behalf" notation when receiving a mail or calendar invitation that was sent on behalf another sender.
- Bug fixs
- Bug fixes

- Calendar Widgets! Add Capsule Calendar widgets on your home screen and easily track your meetings
- Contacts sync to native device is now supported also for different Contacts folders
- Control image size when attaching it to a mail. Can now select if image will have the actual, large, medium or small size
- Bug fixs

- Calendar Widgets! Add Capsule Calendar widgets on your home screen and easily track your meetings
- Contacts sync to native device is now supported also for different Contacts folders
- Control image size when attaching it to a mail. Can now select if image will have the actual, large, medium or small size
- Bug fixes
